title.text: Co-PoeTryMe: a Co-Creative Interface for the Composition of Poetry

abstractContent.text: Co-PoeTryMe is a web application for poetry composition, guided by the user, though with the help of automatic features, such as the generation of full (editable) drafts, as well as the acquisition of additional well-formed lines, or semantically-related words, possibly constrained by the number of syllables, rhyme, or polarity.
Towards the final poem, the latter can replace lines or words in the draft.
